entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
